players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Bob.
Bob was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "I investigated Alice last night and she is the mafioso. We must vote her out today."
You: "I have nothing to hide and trust everyone in this game. Let's focus on finding the real mafia among us."
Diana: "I believe in the innocence of my fellow villagers and trust that we can work together to uncover the mafia among us. Let's not jump to conclusions based on one investigation."

You: "I stand by my previous statement that I trust everyone in this game and believe in the power of teamwork to uncover the mafia among us. Let's focus on gathering more information before making any accusations."

Diana: "I believe in the power of trust and teamwork to uncover the mafia among us. Let's focus on gathering more information before making any accusations, as we don't want to risk falsely accusing an innocent villager."
Charlie: "I investigated Alice and she is mafioso. Diana, if you're town, vote with me to win."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Alice, Diana voted for Charlie (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format)
Charlie was arrested
